always have an itch that you can’t reach?

question: Would you rather never be able to keep anyone else’s secrets or have someone tell all of your secrets?
choices: never be able to keep anyone else’s secrets
have someone tell all of your secrets?

question: Would you rather be Batman or Iron Man?
Would you rather be married to someone stunning who doesn’t think you’re attractive or be married to someone ugly who thinks you’re gorgeous?
choices: be married to someone stunning who doesn’t think you’re attractive
be married to someone ugly who thinks you’re gorgeous?

question: Would you rather have a third ear or a third eye?
Would you rather have $1 million now or $5,000 a week for the rest of your life?
choices: have $5,000 a week for the rest of your life?

question: Would you rather be rich working a job you hate or poor working a job you love?
choices: be rich working a job you hate
poor working a job you love?

question: Would you rather wear real fur or fake jewels?
Would you rather wake up naked in a forest five miles from home or in your underwear at work?
choices: wake up naked in a forest five miles from home
wake up in your underwear at work?

question: Would you rather go backstage with your favorite band or be an extra on your favorite TV show?
choices: go backstage with your favorite band
be an extra on your favorite TV show?

question: Would you rather be able to erase your own memories or be able to erase someone else’s memories?
choices: be able to erase your own memories
be able to erase someone else’s memories?

question: Would you rather be so afraid of heights that you can’t go to the second floor of a building or be so afraid of the sun that you can only leave the house on rainy days?
choices: be so afraid of heights that you can’t go to the second floor of a building
be so afraid of the sun that you can only leave the house on rainy days?

question: Would you rather have a rap battle against Nicki Minaj or Lizzo?
choices: have a rap battle against Nicki Minaj

question: Would you rather save your best friend’s life if it meant five strangers would die or save five strangers if it meant sacrificing your best friend?
choices: save your best friend’s life if it meant five strangers would die
save five strangers if it meant sacrificing your best friend?

question: Would you rather give up coffee or soda forever?
Would you rather find a $100 bill floating in a public toilet or a $20 bill in your own pocket?
choices: find a $100 bill floating in a public toilet
find a $20 bill in your own pocket?

question: Would you rather wear nothing but neon orange or neon green for an entire year?
choices: neon green for an entire year?

question: Would you rather eat the same thing for every meal for a year or be able to eat whatever you wanted, but only once every three days?
choices: eat the same thing for every meal for a year
be able to eat whatever you wanted, but only once every three days?

question: Would you rather get drunk off of one sip of alcohol or never get drunk no matter how much booze you imbibe?
choices: get drunk off of one sip of alcohol
never get drunk no matter how much booze you imbibe?

question: Would you rather sell all of your possessions or sell one of your organs?
Would you rather clean a toilet with your toothbrush or a floor with your tongue?
choices: clean a toilet with your toothbrush

question: Would you rather be asked the same question over and over again or never be spoken to ever again?
choices: be asked the same question over and over again
never be spoken to ever again?

question: Would you rather be reincarnated as a fly or just stop existing when you die?
choices: just stop existing when you die?

question: Would you rather be serenaded by Justin Bieber or Justin Timberlake?
Would you rather be unable to close any door once it’s open or be unable to open any door once it’s closed?
choices: be unable to close any door once it’s open
be unable to open any door once it’s closed?

question: Would you rather throw the best parties but have to clean up the mess by yourself or never go to a party again?
choices: throw the best parties but have to clean up the mess by yourself
never go to a party again?

question: Would you rather have a tattoo of the title of the last book you read or the last TV show you watched?
choices: have a tattoo of the title of the last book you read
the last TV show you watched?

question: Would you rather wear clothes that were always way too big or a couple sizes too small?
choices: wear clothes that were always way too big

question: Would you rather give your parents or your boss access to your browser history?
choices: your boss access to your browser history?

question: Would you rather only be able to wash your hair twice a year or only be able to check your phone once a day?
choices: only be able to wash your hair twice a year
only be able to check your phone once a day?

choices: have aliens be real and covered up by the government

question: Would you rather be caught liking your ex’s Instagram pics or your partner’s ex’s Instagram pics?
choices: be caught liking your ex’s Instagram pics

question: Would you rather never eat cookies ever again or only ever drink water?
Would you rather donate your organs to those who need them or donate your entire body to science?
choices: donate your organs to those who need them

question: Would you rather be criticized or be ignored?
Would you rather work alongside Dwight Schrute or Homer Simpson?

choices: be punished for a crime you didn’t commit

choices: get a cooking lesson from Gordon Ramsay

choices: your parents look through your text messages?

question: Would you rather have your first child when you’re 18 or when you’re 50?
choices: have your first child when you’re 18

question: Would you rather never age physically or never age mentally?

choices: wear a full face of the wrong shades every day?

choices: have a slumber party with Anna Kendrick

question: Would you rather eat chocolate on pizza or never eat chocolate ever again?

choices: have X-ray vision of people you find unattractive

question: Would you rather know when you’re going to die or how you’re going to die?
choices: know when you’re going to die

question: Would you rather lose all of your teeth or all of your hair?

choices: live in a home with no electricity

question: Would you rather be rich with no friends or poor and popular?

choices: have your style critiqued by Anna Wintour

question: Would you rather walk barefoot in a public bathroom or through poison ivy?
choices: walk barefoot in a public bathroom
